sentences.en: Be sure to obey regulations related to campsite selection.
sentences.cn: 必须遵守营地选择相关的规章.

sentences.en: Heavy rain turned the campsite into a mudbath.
sentences.cn: 大雨把露营地变成了一片泥沼。

sentences.en: I hated this place and will never stay at a campsite again.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌这个地方,我再也不去野营地了.

sentences.en: I showed up at the campsite one morning to find them loading their carts.
sentences.cn: 一天早晨，我在营地发现他们正往大篷车里搬家什。

sentences.en: Keep your eyes skinned for a campsite!
Poor campsite selection usually leads to unnecessary resource damage.
sentences.cn: 差的营地选择通常导致不必要的资源伤害.

sentences.en: Standing just 100 feet from his wife, Kirsta, and two toddlers at the campsite, Britton tried to run away from the lion into a clearing, but the lion followed him.
sentences.cn: 在离他仅有100英尺的营地里，有他的妻子克里斯塔和两个刚学走路的孩子。 布里顿试图跑到开阔地，但是狮子却跟随着他。

sentences.en: The campsite is close to all local amenities.
sentences.cn: 营地紧靠当地所有的便利设施。

sentences.en: The campsite is set in the middle of a pine forest.
sentences.cn: 露营地建在了松树林的中间.

sentences.en: The campsite is ten dams to the north.
The smell of the food might attract dangerous animals to our campsite.
sentences.cn: 食物的气味还可能会招引危险的动物到我们的营地来.

sentences.en: The wilderness campsite had its own peculiar enchantment.
sentences.cn: 野营地有其自身独特的魅力。

sentences.en: Then the journey continues on to a campsite where camels await you.
sentences.cn: 然后继续前往一个营地，在那里会有骆驼恭候大驾。

sentences.en: This campsite suffices for our group.
sentences.cn: 这个营地足够我们小组之用.

sentences.en: We can wash in the stream near the campsite.
sentences.cn: 你可以在营地附近的小溪里洗澡.

sentences.en: We were able to return to our campsite before the rain.
sentences.cn: 我们在下大雨前设法回到了野营地.

sentences.en: We'll start back towards the campsite after lunch.
sentences.cn: 我们会在午饭后开始返回露营地.

sentences.en: You can always canoe back down the river to the campsite.
sentences.cn: 你可以随时乘独木舟回到营地.

trans.tran_en: an area where people can camp, often with a water supply and toilets
